level.text: A licensed organization shall keep gross receipts in a separate raffle bank account.
All gross receipts from each raffle shall be deposited in a separate raffle bank account by the end of each business week during which any raffle tickets are sold.
Money shall be withdrawn from the raffle account only for the following:
Payment of expenses in accordance with ยง 1507; and
Disbursement from net proceeds for the lawful purpose stated in the application.
Within thirty (30) days of any raffle draw, all gross receipts shall be disbursed from the raffle account according to ยง1506.3.
The licensed organization shall not commingle any funds from the operation of raffles with and other funds, except in compliance with ยง1506.3.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to May 20, 1988, the D.C. Lottery and Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking at 29 DCR 5016, 5036 (November 12, 1982).
